chapters.title: Chapter 39: Threads in the Pattern
chapters.info: Avendesora, p. 445 (356)—The Tree of Life of legend. The tree is the last of the Chora Trees, products of the Age of Legends. The location of Avendesora is unknown, though it apparently has some connection with the Aiel; they gave the people of Cairhien a gift over 500 years ago of a tree, Avendoraldera, that was grown from a cutling of Avendesora. See also Avendoraldera.
